item.description:
Tired of the snow, cold weather, shoveling...got cabin fever? Let's go for Japanese Sushi Buffet. Meet at Minado at 12 noon. Afterwards we will go see Green Hornet or No Strings Attached at the AMC Framingham theater @ 22 Flutie Pass. Movie is optional.

If you need a ride or can provide a ride - please indicate town and/or T stop you are coming from. Our members are pretty good about providing carpools if needed.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Minado Sushi and Movie
